msg: Last update for the readme prior to the Xalan Java 2.7.0 release.

author: mcnamara
msg: This patch fixes a problem with the default connection pool where we were using an
Iterator but in the Iterator look we were trying to remove elements in the Iterators's
collection. This caused a concurrent access error.
